abstract: British actress Cynthia Erivo's Broadway debut as Celie in musical The Color Purple earns critical praise that has potential to change her career; says she feels comfortable in quintessentially American role and aims to portray character as more than just victim.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Erivo, a 28-year-old British actress, is the talk of Broadway as critics rave about her performance as Celie in a revival of “The Color Purple.”

headline.main: The Actress Cynthia Erivo Rises With ‘The Color Purple’
headline.print_headline: A Defining Role for a Rising Star

snippet: Ms. Erivo, a 28-year-old British actress, is the talk of Broadway as critics rave about her performance as Celie in a revival of “The Color Purple.”
